Creator Daria Polatin

Directed by Steven A. Adelson. Brad Anderson. John Fawcett. Leslie Hope

Written by Aaron Carter. Lorelei Ignas. Daria Polatin. Andrew Wilder. Joy Gregory. Kathleen Hale

Cast Emily Deschanel( Suzanne8 episodes, 2022 ). Sam Jaeger( Peter8 episodes, 2022 ). Gerardo Celasco( Detective Lopez8 episodes, 2022 ). Madeleine Arthur( Mae8 episodes, 2022 ). Xaria Dotson( Jules8 episodes, 2022 ). Alisha Newton( Helen8 episodes, 2022 ). Naomi Tan( Dani8 episodes, 2022 ). Jason Sakaki( Isaac Kimura7 episodes, 2022 ). Max Montesi( James Dressler2 episodes, 2022 ). Luvia Petersen( Detective Anne Beechum / …2 episodes, 2022 ). Eric Breker( Dennis Howard2 episodes, 2022 ). Noel Johansen( Jeff Fisk1 episode, 2022 ). Alessandro Juliani( Bill Untermyer1 episode, 2022 ). Lossen Chambers( Dr. Pamela Hawkins1 episode, 2022 ). Hannah Bos( Young Girl1 episode, 2022 ). Amy Hayashi( Woman in Store1 episode, 2022 ). Jilena Cori( Nurse Jane1 episode, 2022 ). Chloe Morgan( Harvest Dance DJ1 episode, 2022 ). Claire Traille( Kylie1 episode, 2022 ). Nathaniel Vossen( Man in Store1 episode, 2022 ). Kendra Lee( Young Woman1 episode, 2022 ). Reese Alexander( Officer Axel Vaughn1 episode, 2022 ). Benjamin Goas( Boy #11 episode, 2022 ). Kyle Mosonyi( Craig1 episode, 2022 ). Andrew Zachar( Podcast Host1 episode, 2022 ). Denzel Onaba( Boy #21 episode, 2022 ). Ash Lee( Larry Gillium1 episode, 2022 ). Frances Leigh( Bartender1 episode, 2022 ). Mike Ennis( Mechanic1 episode, 2022 ). Kari Staten( RPD Desk Sergeant1 episode, 2022 ). Sophia Bucior( Amontown Girl #11 episode, 2022 ). Jared Arthur( Caleb Dodd1 episode, 2022 ). Eva Brooke Baker( Young Mae1 episode, 2022 ). Tiah Santucci( Young Amontown Girl1 episode, 2022 ). Felicity Anne( Server1 episode, 2022 ). Safina Rasulova( Cheerleader1 episode, 2022 ). Tobi Telford( County Counsel1 episode, 2022 ). Trey Jordan( Teen Patient1 episode, 2022 ). Liam Saretsky( Billy1 episode, 2022 ). Gabriel Carter( Man in Jeans1 episode, 2022 ). Conor Stinson O’Gorman( Scarecrow1 episode, 2022 )

Producers Jadene Stojak Babcock. Ian Hay. Rachel Miller. Andrew Wilder. Daria Polatin

Season 1
